thread.title: Bruno to transfer most of his campaign cash to Senate GOP
thread.title_full: Bruno to transfer most of his campaign cash to Senate GOP - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Bruno to transfer most of his campaign cash to Senate GOP
text: Here’s one way to help your former colleagues. Former Senate Majority Leader Joseph Bruno announced Friday that he will pump about $1.4 million into the Senate Republican Campaign Committee after he was reimbursed the money from the state for his acquittal on federal corruption charges last year. Several campaign committees under Bruno’s control will be [...] The post Bruno to transfer most of his campaign cash to Senate GOP appeared first on Politics on the Hudson.
